Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 14 Oct 2018Sorry to hear about your family situation. Unfortunately, a quick look at HDB's rental scheme criteria shows that you will need to include another Singapore citizen or PR in the basic family nucleus in order to rent directly from HDB. More information can be found here https://www.hdb.gov.sg/cs/infoweb/residential/renting-a-flat/renting-from-hdb/public-rental-schemeI'm afraid the only other option is to rent from the open market if you wanna live on your own, but this typically involves a few hundred dollars commitment a month. As an alternative to living on your own, do you have other close relatives who you can stay with? This may be a better idea than living on your own0 comments0
